ing: 1 pinch dried thyme, or to taste
1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper, or to taste
des: "Easy-to-make raw dip from simple ingredients; I just created it myself when I bought too much cauliflower from the farmers market. It can be used as a salad dressing as well, just add a little more yogurt and olive oil."
ins: Blend cauliflower florets, yogurt, tofu, olive oil, garlic, thyme, oregano, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper in a blender until smooth.
